SKT_FIRST.name: Hurricane Combination
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. The damage dealt is proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Health lost</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000024_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000024_1_1] turn(s)</color>. The damage dealt is proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Health lost</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Typhoon Kick
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, dealing damage proportional to the percentage of the caster's <color=#28d9ed>missing Health</color> and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Reduces Cyclone Change! Cooldown by 2 turns

description: Attacks an enemy, dealing damage proportional to the percentage of the caster's <color=#28d9ed>missing Health</color> and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000024_2_1]</color> chance to reduce the target's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000024_2_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Cyclone Change!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Gains <color=#28d9ed>Invulnerability</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>, but reduces <color=#28d9ed>Health</color> by <color=#28d9ed>99%</color>.
description: Gains <color=#28d9ed>Invulnerability</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000024_3_1] turn(s)</color>, but reduces <color=#28d9ed>Health</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000024_3_2]</color>.

4: Gains Immunity when using this skill

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to reduce Effectiveness of the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000024_chain_1_1]</color> chance to reduce Effectiveness of the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000024_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000024_backup_1_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000024_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage

4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
